overview: FAIRY, GHOST, VIXEN (1965) consists of three fanciful tales that may be loosely classified as ghost stories, but they're presented and designed more along the lines of traditional fairy tales. They're beautifully staged and photographed and have a timeless quality about them with a moral at the end of each.

production_companies.name: Motion Picture & General Investment Co., Ltd.

title: Fairy, Ghost, Vixen
